summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffery to Jes Staley discussing a suggestion made by a professor at Bowdoin regarding a two-week course on gravitational topics for a person named Alexa. The email requests details to determine if the course is worthwhile.

persons.name: Jeffery
persons.context: Jeffery is the sender of the email discussing a course suggestion for Alexa.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email and is being asked to evaluate a course suggestion for Alexa.

persons.name: Alexa
persons.context: Alexa is mentioned as a person who may take the suggested course.

connections.description: Jeffery is communicating with Jes Staley regarding a suggestion for Alexa.
Jeffery is discussing Alexa's potential course with Jes Staley.
Jes Staley is being asked to evaluate a course suggestion for Alexa.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 22, 2010.
Jeffery is suggesting that Alexa take a two-week course next summer.
The course is related to gravitational topics as suggested by a professor at Bowdoin.
